review_text: A detailed Course. Very Good
Some old info like you cannot send 3 emails to the customer any more as this was made in 2018 the info is old but good info for the price.

Some of the content is really good but there are too many short videos without real content
And at times thay address you as if you didn't have any knowledge nor any intelligence... 
And specifically designed for Amazon US 
Despite these shortcomings I enjoyed it
So far so good. I'm midway through the 5th chapter and I'm learning a ton. It's a very valuable course especially if you're thinking of dipping your toe into the world of FBA.

Information is way too old, after watching it several times I noticed many things have changed on the Amazon platform, some of the later skills are skipped over too fast especially in chapter 15, 16, and 17.  This course should be updated immediately. Jump send merged with Jungle Scout. some other platforms have changed also.
very informative in this price
waooo amazing learn alot.. will recommend for the best business practices on amazon.

The course provides enough knowledge to start an FBA.
Totally a great course for those who have no knowledge on the subject and are interested in studying it in an orderly manner step by step

I provide design services to Amazon FBA Sellers. This course not only motivated me to start my own FBA journey but also helped me understand all the different barriers and pain points my clients go through. Recommended to anyone who is looking to take nose dive into Amazon FBA. Super Insightful!
this course taught me a lot.
Wow! Such an amazing course with helpful tips to use in day to day digital marketing services provision. I would highly recommend this course to everyone looking to sell products online.
Learning lots of good tips
Excellent
so far so good, following well.
Very helpful introduction.
Nice tutorial and easy to understand.

The course seems to be very complete - it is a detailed step-by step guide to finding the correct product and selling it "FBA".  I was actually looking for a guide to selling my own product on Amazon, which would be fulfilled by myself rather than Amazon, at least initially.  That being said, I still learned a lot about how Amazon works that I can apply.  One criticism I have is that the course chapter and module titles are mixed up relative to what is actually in some of the chapters - something that can be easily fixed but shows a lack of attention to detail.
You have to have the product, setting up your Amazon Seller Account, listing your product for sale on Amazon( listing) , Contact FBA,  Get reviews, and promotion,
I'm learning a lot of things I never covered before even though I had an Amazon account before.
it was really helpful for me and may i'll succeed in my carieer.
Really old and outdated, the course was never updated over time. This is way old for 2021 or 2022 where you have all these new tools like viral launch, helium 10. amz scout and keepa

It's a good course for a beginner because you get a lot of informations and tips. I would recomment it as an additional source to learn about amazon FBA and for sure you will learn some new helping stuff. The only thing that i didn't like is that the course is made in 2017 and many things have changed, from the tools they suggest to the amazon sellers account website.
I like that is slow pace and explain everything as they go and allow for you to do it yourself to reinforce your knowledge ðŸ˜Š
I enjoyed the course and learned a lot from it. The content is well organised and focused on practical situations. I

As a designer, I offer my services to Amazon FBA sellers. This course inspired me to embark on my own FBA journey and gave me an in-depth understanding of my clients' various challenges and difficulties. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to dive into Amazon FBA. It was incredibly insightful and informative!
